document.full_text: military strikes by the united nations against the ivory coast's strongman, laurent gbagbo, show a new willingness to take bold action to save lives, diplomats and analysts said.
document.title: recent u.n. actions show policy shift, analysts say
lines_and_colors: military strikes by the united nations against the ivory coast's strongman, laurent gbagbo, show a new willingness to take bold action to save lives, diplomats and analysts said.
